title: Breath of Knowledge
description: The One God will soon be forgotten. The last tribe of faithful descendants is on the verge of collapse and Shem can't prevent its demise. When his dearest treasure is ripped from his hands, his only hope lies in the ancient Promise given to Adam and Eve.In a land riddled with violence, Eran alone worships the God of Noah. Her skills as a Healer provide protection. It doesn't last. Avoiding fear she's carried since the Great Flood is no longer an option. It must be conquered, before she is.
author: Rachel S. Neal
